result.execSummary:
All charges against Shane Michael Smith in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Shane Michael Smith is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: 9:58 AM Prosecuting attorney Douglas J Drexler in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Shane Michael Smith in court, in custody.  Attorney Patti l Wabitsch in court for Shane Michael Smith. Court calls 20CF23, 22CF18. State moves to amend 20CF23 to Possession of Controlled Substance 61.43(3g)(b). State moves to dismiss 22CF18. Court dismisses 22CF18 upon State's motion. Court amends 20CF23 to Possession of Controlled Substance upon State's motion. Defendant pleads no contest. Plea is freely, voluntarily, and intelligently given. Constitutional rights read and waived. Court finds defendant guilty to amended charge. Statement by DA. Statement by Attorney Wabitsch. Court sentences defendant to 30 days, credit 66 days, costs within 60 days or commitment order, must submit DNA sample.  Appeal rights given. jjm

9:24 AM Prosecuting attorney Douglas J Drexler in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Shane Michael Smith appeared by video.  Attorney Patti l Wabitsch in court for Shane Michael Smith.  Court calls 22CF18 and 20CF23.  Waiver of prelim filed. Court finds waiver freely and voluntarily waived. Court finds probable cause and binds over for trial. Defendant enters not guilty plea. Court sets $2,000 cash bond on 22CF18. Bond continued on 20CF23. jjm
Final pre-trial scheduled for June 21, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Final pre-trial on June 21, 2022 at 09:30 am.
